content.question: Which of the following processes most immediately led to the global expansion of European political power in the period circa 1500 ?

choices.label: Advances in shipbuilding and navigational methods
Advances in medicine that improved Europeansâ€™ ability to survive in tropical climates

content.answer: Advances in shipbuilding and navigational methods

topic.text: 4.2: Exploration - Causes and Events from 1450 to 1750
